slogan: Значки – це #1 службу підпису для iPhone, iPad, Mac та Apple TV
welcome: Ласкаво просимо до всіх нових підписів!
co2_notice: Знаки сприяють частці кожної покупки, щоб видалити CO2 з атмосфери
ipa_finder_description: Встановлюйте програми безпосередньо з офіційного App Store з нашим ярликом!
appletv_mac_support_title: Зараз на Apple TV та Mac!
appletv_mac_support: Підписи тепер підтримують tvOS та macOS! Встановіть користувацькі програми iOS на ваш Mac або TV використовуючи Signtunes.
unlimited_installs_description: With Signtunes, you're able to install unlimited apps anytime. We have no limit on how many apps you can install.
largest_library_description: Starfiles has the worlds largest IPA library, allowing you to sideload more apps without hassle.
custom_app_description: Using Signtunes, you can easily upload custom IPAs and sideload them.
revoke_protection_description: Signtunes has revoke protection meaning you will experience less revokes. We are so confident in our revoke protection system that we will resign your device for free if Apple does revoke your device.
no_jailbreak_description: Using Signtunes, you don't need a jailbreak to install custom apps!
designed_with_security_description: Signtunes is designed with security in mind. Signtunes is built on top of Starfiles allowing users to enjoy all the security benefits Starfiles provides.
247_chat_description: We provide live chat support, any time of day.
sideloading_research_description: Signtunes is the leading iOS sideloading platform. Made in partnership with Starfiles, Signtunes is made with industry leading technology. Thanks to our amazing developers, Signtunes is able to provide users with features that no other store provides. A large portion of our funding and time goes into researching sideloading methods and ways to improve the product for our customers. Our research has helped improve dozens of sideloading services.
appdb_integration_description: Signtunes is partnered with AppDB allowing you to enjoy all the benefits of AppDB without needing your own developer account!
gbox_integration_description: Signtunes is partnered with GBox allowing you to seamlessly install apps.
scarlet_support_description: Signtunes support Scarlet allowing you to use our certificate on the Scarlet app.
esign_support_description: Signtunes support ESign allowing you to use our certificate on the ESign app.
